## Loading R packages

In this hands-on exercise, two R packages will be used. They are:

-   [tidyverse](https://www.tidyverse.org/), and

-   [haven](https://www.tidyverse.org/).

The code chunk used is as follows:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, haven)
```
:::


## Importing PISA data

The code chunk below uses [`read_sas()`](https://haven.tidyverse.org/reference/index.html) of [`haven`](https://haven.tidyverse.org/) to import PISA data into R environment.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
stu_qqq <- 
  read_sas("data/cy08msp_stu_qqq.sas7bdat")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
stu_qqq_SG <- stu_qqq %>%
  filter(CNT == "SGP")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
write_rds(stu_qqq_SG,
          "data/stu_qqq_SG.rds")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
stu_qqq_SG <- 
  read_rds("data/stu_qqq_SG.rds")
```
:::
